name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years in developing and delivering high-performance applications, notably skilled in **Java**, **Spring**, **JPA**, **JDBC**, and **JUnit**. Proficient in **Angular** for robust frontend solutions, and experienced with database technologies including **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Adept in messaging systems such as **Kafka**, **JMS**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Solace**, ensuring effective communication between microservices. Familiar with **CI/CD** practices, utilizing tools like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, and managing deployment workflows through **ArgoCD**. Strong capabilities in software testing employing **Cypress** and **Jest**. 

Additionally, I have hands-on experience in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure**, alongside utilizing monitoring and tracing tools such as **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **OpenTracing**. My technical repertoire also includes skills in **ElasticSearch**, **MongoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Redis** for optimal data storage and retrieval. I bring a rich background in building applications aligned with industry compliance standards, and I am committed to delivering scalable, efficient solutions.
